name: api-test-automation-framework
description: Comprehensive API test automation framework built with Cypress for enterprise-grade API testing across multiple microservices and environments

scripts.cy:run:staging: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.staging.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:staging:BO: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.staging.js -s cypress/e2e/BO_Agg/**/*.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:staging:CP: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.staging.js -s cypress/e2e/CP_Agg/**/*.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:staging:SCOS: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.staging.js -s cypress/e2e/BO_Scos/**/*.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:staging:PartnerAPI: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.staging.js -s cypress/e2e/PartnerAPI/**/*.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:staging:IntegrationAPI: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.staging.js -s cypress/e2e/IntegrationAPI/**/*.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:staging:BO:CRM: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.staging.js -s cypress/e2e/BO_Agg/CRM/**/*.cy.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:staging:BO:AMS: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.staging.js -s cypress/e2e/BO_Agg/AMS/**/*.cy.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:staging:BO:Compliance: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.staging.js -s cypress/e2e/BO_Agg/Compliance/**/*.cy.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:staging:BO:Billing: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.staging.js -s cypress/e2e/BO_Agg/Billing/**/*.cy.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:uat: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.uat.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:uat:ST: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.uat.js --spec "cypress/e2e/BO_Agg/**/*.cy.js,cypress/e2e/BO_Bff/**/*.cy.js,cypress/e2e/CP_Agg/**/*.cy.js,cypress/e2e/PartnerAPI/**/*.cy.js" && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:uat:SC: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.uat.js --spec "cypress/e2e/IntegrationAPI/**/*.cy.js,cypress/e2e/BO_Scos/**/*.cy.js" && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:uat:BO: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.uat.js -s cypress/e2e/BO_Agg/**/*.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:uat:CP: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.uat.js -s cypress/e2e/CP_Agg/**/*.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:uat:SCOS: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.uat.js -s cypress/e2e/BO_Scos/**/*.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:uat:PartnerAPI: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.uat.js -s cypress/e2e/PartnerAPI/**/*.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:uat:IntegrationAPI: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.uat.js -s cypress/e2e/IntegrationAPI/**/*.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:uat:BO:CRM: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.uat.js -s cypress/e2e/BO_Agg/CRM/**/*.cy.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:uat:BO:AMS: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.uat.js -s cypress/e2e/BO_Agg/AMS/**/*.cy.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:uat:BO:Compliance: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.uat.js -s cypress/e2e/BO_Agg/Compliance/**/*.cy.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
scripts.cy:run:uat:BO:Billing: npx cypress run -C cypress.config.uat.js -s cypress/e2e/BO_Agg/Billing/**/*.cy.js && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html
